madhyama parisara adhikariya athulu me rate parisaraya wenuwen wagakiwayuthu aayathana gananawak thama wagakima paharaharimin sitina welawaka nithignya nuwan bopage , nithignya charitha weththasinha athulu thawath nithignya sahodarawaru ekwa chunnakam damila janathawa wenuwen sidukala mema mahath karyabharaya nisa ada dawasedi thamange parisaraya, jana jiwithaya ha saukhya aaraksha kara ganimatath asadharanaya wenuwen kisiyam wandi mudalak laba ganimatath shri lankawe nithi paddhathiyata nawa pituwak peralimatath mema aithihasika nadu thinduwa haraha haki wu athara parisara ha sobadaham adhyayana madhyasthanaya haraha gonukala me naduwata udaw upakara kala nithignya sahodarawarun thidena kisima mudalak aya nokara thamange rata ha me rate janathawa wenuwen mema aithihasika karyabharaya kala athara ee wenuwen api owun samata apage pranamaya pudakara sitimu.
